item.title: Comment on The robustness of coal? by Crusader
item.description:
A poignant memory from school was a classmate saying that we needed to immediately stop using fossil fuels, me asking clarification if he meant immediately as in today to which he said yes, me asking how we would get to school tomorrow or not freeze during the night, and him yelling at me that I had been brainwashed by the fossil fuel industry.
